name: Soulless Wanderer
description:
You play as AJ a detective  assigned to investigate a school that is said to be cursed, however you end up being cursed as will shattering your soul, you have to collect your souls  in order to come back from the land of the lost souls. 

movements are 
A - left 
D - right
W - forward
S - backwards

W + SFT  - sprint

avoid the monsters that roam the land of  lost souls for they will suck the soul out of you, what's left of it. You can't fight the monsters
